overview:
Visionefx President Ricardo Vidallon has been in the creative business of advertising, cable broadcast, animation and the World Wide Web for more than two decades.

His work has been featured on the Christian Broadcasting Network, Inc., Fox News and NBC Entertainment. His career track and Web consultancy includes the global companies of Reynolds and Reynolds, CMGI Solutions, and Automark, Inc.

Rick has also played music professionally and produced music as a studio musician.
